name: Pet of the Week – Bristol
description: Meet Bristol (Tag #S119), this week's Pet of the Week! She loves meeting new friends and greets them with a case of the zoomies. After getting all her excitement out, Bristol likes to relax and recharge with a nice snack.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: Meet Bristol (Tag #S119), this week’s Pet of the Week! She loves meeting new friends and greets them with a case of the zoomies. After getting all her excitement out, Bristol likes to relax and recharge with a nice snack. If you’re interested in adopting Bristol, please visit www.SDDAC.com.
